subject: Re: Return Pickup Pending - SC-11321
body: Thank you for updating the pickup request. The pickup team still hasn’t contacted us today. Please confirm the assigned time slot.

subject: Re: Missing Items in Shipment SC-PO53804
body: Thank you for your update. We received your confirmation that the dispatch audit has started. Please share the expected timeline for resending the three missing cartons so we can plan internally.

subject: Re: Shipment SC-97694 Delivered to Wrong Address
body: Appreciate your initial acknowledgment. Has the logistics partner confirmed retrieval from the incorrect warehouse? Please update us on the revised delivery ETA.

subject: Re: Shipment SC-67843 Marked Delivered but Not Received
body: Thank you for initiating the investigation. We received the temporary tracking reference, but need confirmation whether the package is actually located. Please advise next steps.

subject: Re: Request for Delivery Estimate PO-19134
body: Thanks for the estimated timeline shared yesterday. Our internal team needs confirmation whether the shipment has officially moved to outbound scanning. Kindly update.

subject: Re: Delayed Shipment for Order SC-21323
body: We acknowledge the update you provided regarding rerouting due to transit delays. Please confirm if the shipment has cleared the hub and is now in final transit.

subject: Re: Damaged Goods in Order SC-95479
body: We received your instructions for submitting damage images. All photos have been uploaded to the portal. Kindly confirm approval for replacement dispatch.

subject: Re: Customs Clearance Delay - Order SC-36712
body: Thank you for resending the documents. Customs is still asking for the revised commercial declaration. Could you please provide that urgently?

subject: Re: Delivery Status Inquiry for Order SC-35452
body: Thank you for the interim tracking link. The status still hasn't changed since yesterday. Please check with the carrier if there is any delay at the sorting center.

subject: Re: Billing Clarification for Order SC-99831
body: We have reviewed the draft invoice you sent. One unit price still shows the incorrect figure. Kindly recheck against the original quotation.

subject: Re: Request for Return Label - Order SC-10567
body: Thank you for acknowledging our return request. The pickup partner has still not contacted us. Please share the confirmed pickup slot.

subject: Re: URGENT: Incorrect Tracking ID Shared for SC-77890
body: We received the corrected tracking ID, but the link is still not showing movement. Please verify whether the shipment has been scanned.

subject: Re: Wrong Invoice Attached for Order SC-88712
body: Thank you for resending the invoice. The totals now match, but one line item still refers to the previous order. Please revise this final detail.

subject: Re: Replacement for Damaged Units SC-44321
body: Thanks for confirming the replacement approval. Kindly share the dispatch number once the shipment is handed over to the carrier.

subject: Re: Request for Bulk Shipment ETA - PO-55210
body: We appreciate the tentative ETA shared earlier. Our distributors require confirmation if the goods have departed the origin warehouse.

subject: Re: Stock Discrepancy in Recent Delivery - SC-99104
body: We received the dispatch slip you resent, but quantities still don’t align with what was delivered. Kindly confirm the corrected figures again.

subject: Re: Shipment SC-56321 Marked Out for Delivery for 3 Days
body: Thank you for escalating the issue. The tracking still shows no movement. Please confirm if the carrier has acknowledged the delay.

subject: Re: Packaging Quality Concerns - SC-80991
body: We appreciate your response regarding improved packaging checks. Please confirm whether this update applies to our upcoming shipments as well.

subject: Re: Need Updated Commercial Invoice ASAP - SC-41231
body: Thanks for sharing the revised invoice. Customs is now requesting the packing list as well. Please forward it urgently.

subject: Re: Duplicate Billing Issue for Order SC-99310
body: Thanks for reviewing the discrepancy. Kindly confirm which invoice should be used for our payment processing.

subject: Re: Order SC-15002: Need Clarification on Partial Delivery
body: We received your clarification about multi-batch delivery. Please share the tracking ID for the remaining batch.

subject: Re: Escalation: Repeated Delays on Order SC-77229
body: Thank you for escalating the matter. We require confirmation from the logistics head regarding the final committed timeline.

subject: Re: Incorrect Dispatch Slip Shared
body: We received the corrected slip, but the product codes still don’t match the PO. Kindly revalidate the updated file.
